text: 44:19 Ofa Gami 16:23; Esekiel 42:13-14Me azenan ikia uari akuvir danganimɨn gumazamiziba bagh mangɨsɨ, me Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven ingangarim damuasa aghuizir korotiaba suegh danganir muziarir zuezibar dar arɨkigh. Egh me korotiar igharazitabar aghuigh azenan mangɨ. Puvatɨghtɨma, gumazamizir kɨniba men korotiar bar zuegha anogoroghezibar suigh, egh me arɨmɨghiregham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me korotiar igharazitabar aghuigh azenan mangam.
